attributes.action: honour Mr Ron Dennis of McLaren Mercedes with a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Ron Dennis has inspired the McLaren F1 racing team for many years and led them to great success, paving the way for Lewis Hamiltion to achieve the World Drivers Championship in 2008. He is a great ambassador for the UK and has demonstrated the highest standards of personal and business integrity.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
